DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety , tolerability , efficacy pharmacokinetics aripiprazole intramuscular ( IM ) depot multiple dos every 4 week adult patient schizophrenia .
DOC.brief_title: A Multiple Dose Safety , Tolerability Pharmacokinetics Study Adult Patients With Schizophrenia Following Administration Aripiprazole IM Depot
